PageDescription: Work on office files within Drupal
Subheader: Work on office files within Drupal
DocumentsScreen1Header: Embed office documents into your Drupal website
DocumentsScreen1Tab1Label: Create, upload and embed docs, sheets, slides, PDFs or to your website.
DocumentsScreen1Tab2Label: Embed the entier room into your webpage allowing visitors to view documents right in the browser.
DocumentsScreen1Tab3Label: Integrate complex PDF forms for filling them in online. Automatically collect and analyse data.
DocumentsScreen1Tab4Label: Prevent downloading, printing and copying documents from your website.
DocumentsScreen2Header: Efficiently manage documents from your Drupal account
DocumentsScreen2Tab1Label: Create a secure space for all your docs. Easily access it anytime anywhere.
DocumentsScreen2Tab2Label: Organiseer uw persoonlijke bestanden en creëer kamers voor uw zakelijke documenten.
DocumentsScreen2Tab3Label: Bied flexibele toegangsrechten: bewerken, opmerkingen plaatsen, beoordelen of alleen bekijken.
DocumentsScreen2Tab4Label: Edit and collaborate on documents with other Drupal users online.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Built to work in Drupal seamlessly
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Install ONLYOFFICE DocSpace app for Drupal from the Drupal Marketplace.
DocsAppHeader: Add office documents to your Drupal pages
DocsAppTab1Label: Preview documents on the public pages.
DocsAppTab2Label: Edit docs, sheets, slides, forms, and PDFs in the Drupal Media module.
DocsAppTab3Label: Collaborate on office files in real time with other Drupal users.
Reason1: Een uitgebreide reeks tools voor bewerken, opmaken en stylen. <0>Geïntegreerde AI helper</0> (ChatGPT of ZhiPu Copilot).
Reason2: <0>Realtime</0> en paragraafvergrendeling, gezamenlijke bewerking, beoordeling, versiegeschiedenis, documentvergelijking, opmerkingen en vermeldingen.
Reason3: <0>Built-in chat</0> and Telegram integration. Jitsi and Rainbow plugins for real-time communication.
Reason4: Ondersteuning voor meer dan <0>50 bestandsformaten</0>. Volledig geschikt voor MS Office-formaten: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason5: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Activity tracking and audit reporting. Encryption at rest and in transit. Open source code.
Reason6: <0>Free plan to start.</0> Business plan for more admins, bigger storage, enhanced security and professional support. Self-hosted solution for total control over your data.
HowToStartStep1Docs: Implementeer <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> op uw eigen server of meld u aan voor <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Get the integration app from <0>Drupal Marketplace</0>.
HowToStartStep3: Upload and configure the integration app.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Lees de gedetailleerde instructies in het <0>Helpcentrum</0>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Heeft u een app nodig om ONLYOFFICE te koppelen aan uw favoriete webservice? Of heeft u er een ontwikkeld?
